channel.title: Auto Clicker
channel.description:
I need an auto-clicker that has : -anti-randoms, -anti-detect (so I don't get banned =D), -and a randomized clicker for the mouse (basically the same as the other thing).
I would script it if I had any knowledge of C+/C++ lol.
Thanks if you can make it, ='( if you can't. :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2009, 01:30:39 am[/size][hr]And NO, I'm not being a 2009 idiot like other posts ;)

item.title: Auto Clicker
item.dc:creator: @jimmy5410 jimmy5410
item.description:
@jimmy5410 wrote:

Here ya go! It randomly clicks, and has AntiRandoms.

[Quote]program Clicker;
{.include SRL\SRL.SCAR}

var
x,y : Integer;

Procedure Click;
begin
MMouse(Random(750), Random(750), Random(100), Random(100));
Wait(100+Random(100));
Getmousepos(x,y);
Mouse(x,y,1,1,false);
end;

Procedure AntiRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindTalk;
If(FindFight) then
begin
RunAway(‘N’, True,1,15000);
Wait(5000+random(5000));
end;
FindLamp(‘mining’);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
Click;
AntiRandoms;
until(false);
end.[/Quote]

Read full topic

item.description:

every single script worth using has

anti randoms and a randomized clicker…

without any more information no one can even begin to help you
